L8(2rsD9Wy3N@IdPpFX2.text:
game_start

This broadcast is sent when the game starts or restarts. It is called when the green flag is clicked, and it is also called when the player presses 'W' to restart the game when they die.

fUC.Nr2Ds1LjMWYGmBld.text:
can_shoot

The variable can_shoot belongs to player_ship and is either 0 or 1. 0 means that the player cannot shoot, and 1 means the player can shoot.

1wE*nV5*L6HZvs#B.cLi.text:
player_health

player_health is a variable that all sprites can access. It blows up the player when the player_health reaches 0. It is displayed next to the heart symbol.

C:v;dsI7r_6h,euV,nQv.text:
intangible

The variable intangible belongs to the player_ship and it keeps track of whether or not the ship is immune to bullets.

wk[:M`.LV]!ztTcz=l*p.text:
flicker

flicker is a variable that belongs to player_ship. It defines the interval where the player flashes when intangible.

VI!ROL=3{z?JQn@LJk{a.text:
special_flag

special_flag is a variable that any sprite can access. It determines if the player_blast object will clone itself for the special fire functionality. it can be 0 or 1.

^2u5voR(N)w)2,%ax8K,.text:
player_energy

player_energy keeps track of the stat next to the lightning bolt on the screen. It dictates whether or not the player can fire plasma bolts or fire triple bolts. The player will gain one energy every second and can also gain energy

Pm2@fN%j)D4VfA`$rF!W.text:
reload

The reload message sets can_shoot to 1 after 0.1 seconds. This means that the 0.1 seconds in reload is the plasma cannon's rate of fire.

jGi60FxBrW#UPdUHESc?.text: This hat block will transfer 100 energy points to 1 life point when the 'e' key is pressed.

j[XA~xOH9L`bRhELmVE^.text: The special_flag system will differentiate between a normal plasma launch and a triple plasma launch. Scratch's clones are instantiated as threads, and, as such, a rapidly changing parameter  will create interference with the created clones. Therefore, clones should be created where the parameter is guaranteed.

t%W_As896P]Q[~me7qMb.text: Impacts are handled by two arrays. It is imperfect, so there may be hanging hitboxes if an impact fails to register

Pm2@fN%j)D4VfA`$rF!W.text:
reload
